fields.Title: CANAL / SAMARAN BUTTER SIGN VISCAL
fields.Description: You find tire tracks indicating that a car leapt over the canal.
fields.Placement:
Area: the wrecked Samaran Butter sign 
Details:

fields.Title: You: "Look at the sign."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at the sign.

fields.Title: You: "Look at the roof of the shack."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at the roof of the shack.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "The SAMARAN BUTTER billboard still..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The SAMARAN BUTTER billboard still looks freshly painted, suggesting it took the plunge recently.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Judging by the size of the impact a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Judging by the size of the impact and the parallel lines of burnt rubber, the cause was probably a motor vehicle.

fields.Title: You: "Look at the broken posts."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at the broken posts.

fields.Title: You: "Attempt to reconstruct what happene..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Attempt to reconstruct what happened here.

fields.Title: You: "Why the Coupris 40?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Why the Coupris 40?

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Still speeding, the vehicle made a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Still speeding, the vehicle made a loop and vanished into the fog along the coast.

fields.Title: You: ""Yup -- *I* did this.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yup -- *I* did this."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Clearly, yes. Dwelling on it longe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Clearly, yes. Dwelling on it longer only makes it worse."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Goat milk butter. The Samaran terra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Goat milk butter. The Samaran terrain makes it easier to raise goats than cows, and the local goat farmers produce high-quality meat and dairy staples that add variety to other nations' diets.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Within the past 72 hours."
fields.Dialogue Text: Within the past 72 hours.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Clearly. The motor carriage in ques..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Clearly. The motor carriage in question was a Coupris 40 -- mere minutes before it took a final voyage into the ocean.

fields.Title: Perception (Taste): "It's an acquired taste."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's an acquired taste.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "There are two good candidates: the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There are two good candidates: the Coupris 40 and the Linnea G22.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Very sturdy but light motor carriag..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Very sturdy but light motor carriage. More likely than most to survive that jump.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "The black marks on the roof indicat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The black marks on the roof indicate that the vehicle *vaulted* from the crater to the roof of the shack.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Side slip marks indicate that the v..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Side slip marks indicate that the vehicle was travelling up the crater at 35 km/h.

fields.Title: You: "Why the Linnea G22?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Why the Linnea G22?

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "These match the tyre tracks you saw..."
fields.Dialogue Text: These match the tyre tracks you saw earlier -- *your* tyre tracks.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The Linnea G22 is not a particularl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Linnea G22 is not a particularly popular model due to its peculiar proportions, which the manufacturer's design team probably thought about for too long.

fields.Title: You: "Nothing more to see here. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing more to see here. [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: "Blink. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Blink. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "The vehicle soared through the air,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The vehicle soared through the air, hitting the billboard and upsetting the posts. Then it continued its flight, taking the billboard with it.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "A crumpled billboard reading "SAMAR..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A crumpled billboard reading "SAMARAN BUTTER" soaks in the canal. Two ugly lines mar the bright countenance of the blond boy depicted.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "Whatever it is, the boy on the bill..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whatever it is, the boy on the billboard seems very happy about it.

fields.Title: You: "Look at the crater."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at the crater.

fields.Title: You: ""Yup -- *I* did this.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yup -- *I* did this."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "These look like the same tyre track..."
fields.Dialogue Text: These look like the same tyre tracks I saw earlier -- in front of the Whirling-in-Rags.

fields.Title: You: "What is Samaran Butter?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What is Samaran Butter?

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "The sign broke the vehicle's fall i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The sign broke the vehicle's fall into the canal.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "The sign billboard has fallen on th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The sign billboard has fallen on the water lock, keeping it open -- and thus out of order.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Just some tasteless advertising at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just some tasteless advertising at the bottom of a canal. No use rubbernecking now.

fields.Title: You: "How recently?"
fields.Dialogue Text: How recently?

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "The panel served as a take-off ramp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The panel served as a take-off ramp.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks on, waiting fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant looks on, waiting for you to wrap up your analysis.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The Coupris 40 is a very popular mo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Coupris 40 is a very popular model with bank clerks, topping-pie delivery drivers, secondary school teachers, cops, strippers dressed as cops, undressed strippers...

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "The crumpled SAMARAN BUTTER billboa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The crumpled SAMARAN BUTTER billboard still soaks in the canal, marked by tyre tracks.

fields.Title: You: "Look at the opposite bank."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at the opposite bank.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Now? You'd have to follow the track..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Now? You'd have to follow the tracks to be sure.

fields.Title: You: "What now?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What now?

fields.Title: You: "Look at the sloping metal roof pane..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at the sloping metal roof panel.

fields.Title: You: "What was the model of this phantom..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What was the model of this phantom vehicle?

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["canal.samaran_vis_calc_crater"] == true  and  Variable["canal.samaran_vis_calc_roofing"] == true  and  Variable["canal.samaran_vis_calc_panel"] == true  and  Variable["canal.samaran_vis_calc_posts"] == true  and  Variable["canal.samaran_vis_calc_sign"] == true  and  Variable["canal.samaran_vis_calc_bank"] == true  and  Variable["village.sunken_encyclo_coupris_forty"] == false  and  Variable["village.sunken_model_coupris_40_established"] == false

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "It's about the right size, and the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's about the right size, and the tyre marks look like they came from the skinny tyres frequently found on that motor carriage.
